me.WithdrawalMethods.name: Withdrawal Methods
me.WithdrawalMethods.tips_1: 1. Make sure you make the deposit to the correct address.
me.WithdrawalMethods.tips_2: 2. Do not deposit other than the type of currency supported by the Crypto Currency system, for example: TRC20 USDT wallet, only accept TRC20 USDT, please do not transfer ERC20 USDT to avoid loss of any kind.
me.WithdrawalMethods.tips_3: 3. The transfer will be effective in 5 minutes, in case of any delay or problem you can contact our customer service team.
me.addacount.name: add new wallet
me.transaction.name: Transaction
me.Teamrules.name: Teamrules
me.Teamrules.1: Good news! Build up your own team and get bonus. Invite your friends to join us through your invitation code or link；
me.Teamrules.2: You invite a member A, every penny A makes, you get 30% bonus;
me.Teamrules.3: A invites a member B, every penny B makes, you get 20%
